entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few flurries beginning in the afternoon. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: A few flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow early in the evening. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 near midnight then light after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Saturday 18 March 2023
